metadata.name: Undefeated
metadata.description:
And this darkness will finally end here  
And this light will finally shine  
I will cherish these angles that saved me  
Taken what's evil and given what's mine

I will live and bleed my heart out  
I will create until my heart is whole 
This is my reason; this is my purpose  
This is exactly why I was born

And when I'm so lost, it guides me home  
It is my deadly weapon to defeat the dark  
Because it reaches deep inside my soul 
With every brush stroke, my pain paints art

Art fills my days with endless light 
It is the beating heart that I have missed  
It heals each scar and gives me hope  
Art is the drug that I can never resist
